description: SNMP Based Dashboard to Monitor Dell Hosts via iDRAC - by ilovepancakes95

targets.query: SELECT "bios-version" FROM "idrac-hosts" WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "system-name" LIMIT 1
show tag values cardinality from "idrac-hosts" with key = "system-name"
SELECT "log-dates" FROM "idrac-hosts" WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "log-number" LIMIT 1

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "idrac-hosts" WITH KEY="system-name"
list.label: iDRAC Host
list.name: idrac_host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "idrac-hosts" WITH KEY="system-name"

title: iDRAC - Host Stats
